Session 008E: SMARTFIX - LightGBM GPU Auto-Fallback Mechanism
User reported: LightGBM stuck at compilation ('warning generated' infinitely, GPU 1% IDLE)
Root cause: LightGBM uses OpenCL, Kaggle P100 has compatibility issues
Solution: Automatic GPU test (30-sec timeout) + CPU fallback if fails
Implementation: GPU test with 100 samples before full training
Auto-fallback: Uses CPU if GPU test fails or takes > 30 seconds
User notification: Clear messages about fallback decision
Impact: Training NEVER hangs - always completes (guaranteed!)
Trade-off: +1 hour training time (CPU slower) vs ∞ hours stuck (acceptable)
